model.notes: Trackers may include GPS model 305 for location information
model.label: Tracker Controller DRAFT 2

point.description: 24 hour local time stamp to second
point.label: Time

point.description: Local date in YYYYMMDD format
point.label: Date

point.description: Number of the day in the year (1-366)
point.label: Day

point.description: Number of trackers being controlled.  Size of repeating block.
point.label: Trackers

point.description: Type of tracker
point.label: Type

point.description: Descriptive name for this control unit
point.label: Controller

point.description: Descriptive name for this tracker unit
point.label: Tracker

point.notes: Conformant implementations shall implement El or Az
point.description: Auto target elevation in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type
point.label: Target Elevation

point.notes: Conformant implementations shall implement El or Az
point.description: Auto target azimuth  in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis horizontal tracker type
point.label: Target Azimuth

point.notes: Conformant implementations shall implement El or Az
point.description: Actual elevation position  in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type
point.label: Elevation

point.notes: Conformant implementations shall implement El or Az
point.description: Actual azimuth position  in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis horizontal tracker type
point.label: Azimuth

point.description: Scale Factor for targets and position measurements in degrees
point.label: SF

point.description: Tracker alarm conditions
point.label: Alarm

symbol.description: One or more trackers are NOT at SetPoint
symbol.label: SetPoint

symbol.description: One or more trackers ELEVATION motor is obstructed
symbol.label: ObsEl

symbol.description: One or more trackers AZIMUTH motor is obstructed
symbol.label: ObsAz

point.notes: Combined tracker alarm conditions.  See individual trackers for alarms
point.description: Global tracker alarm conditions
point.label: Alarm

point.description: Global manual override target position of elevation in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type
point.label: Manual Elevation

point.description: Global manual override target position of azimuth in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type
point.label: Manual Azimuth

point.description: Global Control register operates on all trackers. Normal operation is automatic.  Operator can override the position by setting the ElCtl, AzCtl and enabling Manual operation. Entering calibration mode will revert to automatic operation after calibration is complete.
point.label: Mode

point.description: Manual override target position of elevation in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type
point.label: Manual Elevation

point.description: Manual override target position of azimuth in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type
point.label: Manual Azimuth

point.description: Control register. Normal operation is automatic.  Operator can override the position by setting the ElCtl, AzCtl and enabling Manual operation. Entering calibration mode will revert to automatic operation after calibration is complete.
point.label: Mode
